biotools.summary: ELIXIR-SI eLearning Platform (EeLP) is a learning management system (LMS) continuously administered and maintained by ELIXIR Slovenia. EeLP is an open educational resource that enables all-in-one-place access to materials, tools and services for any ELIXIR-related course.
